r.t: Start of Block: Default Question Block
If jobcat5 = 23 or jobcat8 = 9 or jobcat9 = 16
1 HAIR_CHECK_1 - Which of the following do you work as?
1A1 HAIR_RADIO_1A1 - In the last working week, did you straighten hair?
1A1A1 HAIR_CHECK_1A1A1 - How did you straighten hair?
HAIR_1A1A1A BKT (Brazilian keratin treatment) or Brazilian hair straightening (1)
1A2 HAIR_RADIO_1A2 - In the last working week, did you disinfect combs or brushes?
1A2A1 HAIR_CHECK_1A2A1 - What did you use to disinfect combs and brushes?
If 1 = HAIR_1B Beauty Therapist (includes nail technician)
1B1 HAIR_RADIO_1B1 - In the last working week, did you do manicures or pedicures?
1B1A1 HAIR_RADIO_1B1A1 - Did you use UV lamps for nail polish curing?
RADIO_1B1A1A1_1 - Did you have any measures in place to protect you from the UV light?
CHECK_1B1A1A1_1A1 - Which of the following measures were in place?
aAUV_1A1A Time delay before the equipment could be opened after switching it off (1)
aAUV_1A1B Equipment could not be opened when it was switched on (2)
aAUV_1A1C The UV units you used were fully enclosed or contained behind glass or plexiglass screens (3)
RADIO_1B1A1A1_1A2 - Did you wear safety goggles, glasses or a similar eye protective equipment to protect you from the UV light?
If 1 = HAIR_1B Beauty Therapist (includes nail technician)
1B2 HAIR_RADIO_1B2 - Did you operate solarium lamps for tanning?
1B2A1 HAIR_RADIO_1B2A1 - Did you have any measures in place to protect you from the UV light?
If 1 = HAIR_1B Beauty Therapist (includes nail technician)
1B3 HAIR_RADIO_1B3 - In the last working week, did you administer UV light for skin care treatments?
1B3A1 HAIR_RADIO_1B3A1 - Were the UV units you used in the last working week fully enclosed or contained behind glass or plexiglass screens?
1B3A2 HAIR_RADIO_1B3A2 - Did you wear safety goggles, glasses or a similar eye protective equipment?
If jobcat5 = 23 or jobcat8 = 9 or jobcat9 = 16
RADIO_2_1 - In the last working week, did you clean fabrics such as carpets, clothes or textiles?
CHECK_2_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following chemicals to clean stains from fabrics?
aFAB_1A1B Solvent- based cleaners (e.g. Petroleum distillates / hydrocarbon dry cleaners) (2)
CHECK_2_1A2 - How was the area where you worked ventilated?
aFAB_1A2A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aFAB_1A2B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aFAB_1A2C By a general ventilation system (3)
aFAB_1A2D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aFAB_1A2E By open doors or windows (5)
aFAB_1A2F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
if jobcat5 = 23 or jobcat8 = 9 or jobcat9 = 16
RADIO_3_1 - In the last working week, did you clean your hands with anything other than water, soap, detergent, or antibacterial gel/spray at work?
CHECK_3_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following to clean your hands at work?
aCLH_1A1B Mineral turpentine, mineral spirits or white spirit or paint thinner (2)
